english_translation: Narrated by Abu Abd al-Rahman al-Sulami: We took this Quran from people, and they informed us that when they learned ten verses, they did not exceed them to the next ten until they understood what was in them. So we used to learn the Quran and act upon it. And indeed, after us, a people will inherit the Quran, they drink it as one drinks water, and it will not pass their throats, rather it will not go beyond here, and he placed his hand on the throat.
